mixed-citation.named-content: Takiyaella daniela Gonçalves & Domahovski 2021, gen. et sp. nov.
mixed-citation.article-title: A new genus and five new species of Neocoelidiinae leafhoppers from Brazil (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) with a key to males

tp:treatment-sec.p: The specific epithet is a tribute to Prof. Dr Daniela Maeda Takiya in recognition of her remarkable contribution to our knowledge of the Brazilian Auchenorrhyncha , and also in gratitude for her great friendship and for bringing the first author to the study of leafhoppers. The species epithet is treated as a noun in apposition.
